definition: to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: A beautiful, naked woman appears out of nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 一個裸體美女頓然出現在他面前，並走向了他。

sentences.english: Suddenly felt, when looking at tree maple tree, so amarizonaing, so amarizonaing.
sentences.chinese: 頓然覺得，那棵楓葉樹孺慕的時候，好美，好美。

sentences.english: AS a result of his refusal to obey the chairman.
sentences.chinese: 他因爲拒絕服從主席而頓然顯赫一時。

sentences.english: He came into prominence as a result of his refusal to obey the chairman.
sentences.chinese: 他因爲拒絕服從主席而頓然顯赫一時。

sentences.english: She blanched to hear the bad news.
sentences.chinese: 聽到這壞消息，她頓然失色。

sentences.english: The brakes screeched and the car suddenly stopped with a jerk.
sentences.chinese: 剎車尖響一下，車頓然停下。
